name: get_wisdom_quotes_by_page
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wisdom_quotes.
Tool description: Last update: February 11, 2023.
An API providing a lot of different wisdom quotes.  You will love it!
API description: Returns an JSON object that includes:

- the page number requested  (current_page), 
- the amount of all pages (max_pages),
- the amount of the quotes (quotes_count) (15 per page),
- the wisdom quotes array (quotes).

page.description: The page number to retrieve quotes from.
